name: Love Tic
description:
In Love Tic, you play as Koro, a sea bunny with the ability to attach himself to blocks to scale all sorts of terrain. Navigate him through a chaotic, ever-changing level while chasing down a fleeting heart.

Gameplay is relatively simple: Try to reach the Red Heart before time runs out! Every time you reach the Red Heart, you get a little more time before the Red Heart moves to a new location. Collect White Hearts for points, and survive as long as you can! The level shifts around constantly, so watch your step!

This game took a lot of effort to make, and this version has almost none of the features I wanted to add in. I feel like I'd definitely continue this project, just because of how much potential I think it has!

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Z: Jump

X: Hook

Space: Skip cutscene (as long as you played the game before)

Backspace: Skip straight to game (as long as you played the game before)
